es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.ttt

Class TicTacToeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.connectN.ConnectNFactory
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.ttt.TicTacToeFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedTTTFactory

    public class TicTacToeFactory
extends ConnectNFactory
    A Factory for Tic-Tac-Toe. It basically the same as the of ConnectN. Except that it uses a different console player, creates different rules, and is restricted to two players only.

    Factor√≠a del juego Tic-Tac-Toe (3 en raya). Es fundamentalmente el mismo juego que ConnectN, excepto que utiliza un jugador de modo consola diferente y crea reglas diferentes.
